r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: PCBC-742: Propagate custom value transcoder to results PCBC-707: Add scope-level query and scope qualifier support for QueryOptions. PCBC-741: Fix memory leak in Bucket::viewQuery() PCBC-734: Fix destruction of SearchOptions. PCBC-591: KeyNotFoundException is an alias for DocumentNotFoundException
